EmailTemplate.name: CSC - Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Yodle Customer Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are very excited to have you as a client and value your feedback. We're committed to continually improving the quality of the services and products we provide to you.
In that spirit, we would appreciate your feedback on Yodle by responding to a brief survey about your experience. This survey should take less than five minutes to complete and will help us reach our goal of making your program a success.
Click the link below to access the survey: http://survey.clicktools.com/app/survey/go.jsp?iv=to267lm00v9i&q1={!Case.Id}&q2={!Account.Id}&q14={!Case.Issue_Resolved_By__c}&q3={!Case.IMS_Rep_First_Name__c}
Kent Warren Vice President, Client Services
Â©{!User.Today_s_Year__c} by Yodle Web.com, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
